targets.rawSql: SELECT operator_name FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" WHERE COALESCE(operator_name, '') <> '' GROUP BY operator_name
SELECT pr_creator FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" WHERE COALESCE(pr_creator, '') <> '' GROUP BY pr_creator
SELECT pr_closing_time, pr_title FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" WHERE pr_closing_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pr_closing_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT pr_merging_time, pr_title FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" WHERE pr_merging_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pr_merging_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT time_delta_closing_creation, pr_closing_time FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" ORDER BY pr_closing_time LIMIT 1
SELECT AVG(time_delta_merging_creation) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" LIMIT 50
SELECT AVG(time_delta_closing_creation) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" LIMIT 50
SELECT pr_closing_time, pr_title, pr_merge, pr_url, time_delta_closing_creation FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" WHERE pr_closing_time IS NOT NULL ORDER BY pr_closing_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT pr_creator, COUNT(pr_url) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" GROUP BY pr_creator ORDER BY COUNT(pr_url) DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT pr_creator, COUNT(pr_url) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" GROUP BY pr_creator ORDER BY COUNT(pr_url) DESC
SELECT operator_name, COUNT(pr_url) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" WHERE COALESCE(operator_name, '') <> '' GROUP BY operator_name ORDER BY COUNT(pr_url) DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT operator_name, COUNT(pr_url) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_data" WHERE COALESCE(operator_name, '') <> '' GROUP BY operator_name ORDER BY COUNT(pr_url) DESC
SELECT COUNT(pipelinerun) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE pipeline_name = 'operator-hosted-pipeline' GROUP BY pipelinerun

SELECT MAX(pipelinerun_duration), pipelinerun_start_time FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE pipeline_name = 'operator-hosted-pipeline' GROUP BY pipelinerun_start_time, pipelinerun ORDER BY pipelinerun_start_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT COUNT(pipelinerun) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE pipeline_name = 'operator-release-pipeline' GROUP BY pipelinerun

SELECT MAX(pipelinerun_duration), pipelinerun_start_time FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE pipeline_name = 'operator-release-pipeline' GROUP BY pipelinerun_start_time, pipelinerun ORDER BY pipelinerun_start_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(pipelinerun_duration), pipeline_name FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE pipeline_name = 'operator-hosted-pipeline' GROUP BY pipelinerun, pipeline_name
SELECT MAX(pipelinerun_duration), pipeline_name FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE pipeline_name = 'operator-release-pipeline' GROUP BY pipelinerun, pipeline_name
SELECT MAX(pipelinerun_duration) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE pipeline_name = 'operator-hosted-pipeline' GROUP BY pipelinerun
SELECT pipelinerun_duration, pipelinerun FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE pipeline_name = 'operator-release-pipeline'
SELECT taskrun_duration FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE taskrun = 'preflight-trigger' ORDER BY pipelinerun_start_time DESC
SELECT taskrun_duration FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE taskrun = 'request-signature' ORDER BY pipelinerun_start_time DESC

SELECT taskrun, AVG(taskrun_duration) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE (pipelinerun_comment = true AND COALESCE(taskrun, '') <> '' AND pipeline_name = 'operator-hosted-pipeline') GROUP BY taskrun ORDER BY AVG(taskrun_duration) DESC LIMIT 50

SELECT taskrun, AVG(taskrun_duration) FROM "${repository_name}_pr_comments_stats" WHERE (pipelinerun_comment = true AND COALESCE(taskrun, '') <> '' AND pipeline_name = 'operator-release-pipeline') GROUP BY taskrun ORDER BY AVG(taskrun_duration) DESC LIMIT 50
